attributes.action: Declare openly that once he has left the political scene he will not take up any 'fat cat' position with any financial institution within the UK or its dominions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that this current economic situation has been brought about by corpoate greed and a lack of proper regulation which was ignored and encouraged by this government, especially the previous chancellor and the ongoing failure to bring before the courts anybody of substance (Old School Tie Ect) that was culpable in engeneering and stoking the climate that has resulted in this 'global downturn' bringing financial misery to millions of ordinary decent people. Gordon Brown should not be allowed to rub salt into peoples wounds by sauntering off to work about 60 seconds a week for several of the banks etc on an eye-watering salary after he has been righteously been kicked out of office

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
